title: The Portal
description: If one of them dies, they both die.  Bound together as soulmates, something compels Alora and Kaevin to abandon the safety of their refuge for the dangers of Kaevinâ€™s realm.  The soulmates arrive in the midst of a raging battle as Stone Clan warriors defend their capital, an attack made more deadly by the pervasive evil of her father. Alora and Kaevin face mortal danger as they fight against man and magick to preserve Kaevin's home and heritage.  For Alora's father will have her allegiance. Or her death.
author: Tamie Dearen
